name: Mouse
description:
Mouse is a 2D, mouse-only puzzle game where you have to get your mouse through a variety of levels, some of which test speed, others test a steady hand and others involve thinking a little more.

Any and all feedback is much appreciated. More levels will most likely be added in the future.

V3 IS HERE!

NOTE:
V3 is the latest version, if you have an older version please upgrade and download the newer version.
